BuxomMod:NakedRelic.NAME: Curse of Nudity
BuxomMod:NakedRelic.FLAVOR: Your naked body magically slips out of any attempt to cover it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Start each combat with #b5 additional BuxomMod:Buxom. Permanently #yExpose. If you would #yExpose, gain [E].

BuxomMod:DwarfBoobsRelic.NAME: J-Cup Bra
BuxomMod:DwarfBoobsRelic.FLAVOR: Prone to larger breasts than humans, Lehmana's J-cups are not as noteworthy as you'd think.
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase your #yBra's capacity by #b1 at the start of your turn.

BuxomMod:WashboardRelic.NAME: Washboard

BuxomMod:CowRelic.NAME: Stuffed Cow
